morph_prompts: extreme macro close-up of ancient stone temple wall covered in emerald moss, photorealistic texture showing weathered Sanskrit carvings partially hidden by thick vegetation, golden sunlight filtering through jungle canopy, dewdrops clinging to moss and carved stone details

intimate macro shot of temple doorway with massive tree roots growing through cracked stones, photorealistic bark texture intertwining with ancient masonry, sacred symbols still visible between root systems, atmospheric mist rising from jungle floor, warm morning light

close-up of ruined temple altar overgrown with luminescent fungi and flowering vines, photorealistic stone surface with intricate carvings barely visible beneath plant growth, candle flames flickering in hidden niches, magical bioluminescent atmosphere

macro view of temple stairs disappearing into thick jungle vegetation, photorealistic worn stone steps covered in fallen leaves and growing ferns, ancient handrails wrapped in twisted vines, shafts of golden light penetrating dense foliage above

extreme close-up of temple bell tower with giant banyan tree growing through center, photorealistic aerial roots cascading down weathered stone walls, bronze bells hanging among branches, evening light creating dramatic shadows through temple ruins

intimate macro of temple pool filled with lotus flowers, photorealistic water lilies floating on mirror-like surface reflecting carved temple columns, koi fish swimming between lily pads, ancient stone gods emerging from water covered in algae and water plants

close-up of temple courtyard reclaimed by jungle, photorealistic cobblestone floor with grass and wildflowers growing between stones, monkey statues covered in moss, tropical birds nesting in carved niches, dappled sunlight through tree canopy

macro shot of temple library with books and scrolls slowly being consumed by nature, photorealistic paper textures deteriorating among growing ferns and climbing ivy, ancient knowledge preserved in stone tablets covered by vegetation, mystical atmosphere

extreme close-up of temple spire piercing through jungle canopy, photorealistic stone pinnacle with carved elephants and gods wrapped in hanging gardens, aerial view showing temple roof gardens with flowering trees growing from cracks in ancient stones

final macro view of temple complex at golden hour, photorealistic panorama of multiple structures claimed by nature, tree-covered ruins creating living architecture, warm sunset light illuminating the harmony between ancient human craft and eternal natural growth
